verses.verse: <WG2532> I saw <WG1492> another <WG243> great <WG3173> and <WG2532> marvelous <WG2298> sign <WG4592> in <WG1722> the sky: <WG3772> seven <WG2033> angels <WG32> having <WG2192> the seven <WG2033> last <WG2078> plagues, <WG4127> for <WG3754> in <WG1722> them <WG846> God <WG2316>'s wrath <WG2372> is finished. <WG5055>

<WG2532> I saw <WG1492> something like <WG5613> a sea <WG2281> of glass <WG5193> mixed <WG3396> with fire, <WG4442> and <WG2532> those who overcame <WG3528> <WG1537> the beast, <WG2342> <WG1537> his <WG846> image, <WG1504> and <WG2532> <WG1537> the number <WG706> of his <WG846> name, <WG3686> standing <WG2476> on <WG1909> the sea <WG2281> of glass, <WG5193> having <WG2192> harps <WG2788> of God. <WG2316>

<WG2532> After <WG3326> these things <WG5023> I looked, <WG1492> and <WG2532> <WG99999> the temple <WG3485> of the tabernacle <WG4633> of the testimony <WG3142> in <WG1722> heaven <WG3772> was opened. <WG455>

<WG2532> One <WG1520> of <WG1537> the four <WG5064> living creatures <WG2226> gave <WG1325> to the seven <WG2033> angels <WG32> seven <WG2033> golden <WG5552> bowls <WG5357> full <WG1073> of the wrath <WG2372> of God, <WG2316> who lives <WG2198> <WG1519> forever <WG165> and ever. <WG165>
